p: The essential oil of O. odoriferous was extracted by hydrodistillation in a Clevenger type apparatus. Briefly, approximately 1 kg of the plant material was crushed and subjected to extraction with 2.5 L of distilled water at boiling temperature for 2 h. After extraction, the essential oil was combined with anhydrous sodium sulfate (Na 2SO 4) and stored under refrigeration (−4 °C) for preservation [ 47].
